text: == Events == === By place === ==== Europe ==== * December 29 - Charles the Bald, king of West Francia, is crowned emperor. * The Danes capture Lindisfarne and arrive in Cambridge. * Harald Fairhair subdues the rovers on Orkney and Shetland and adds them to his kingdom. ==== Asia ==== * In Champa, in the central region of what is now Vietnam, King Indravarman II founds a new dynasty at Indrapura (Quang Nam). He starts a building program featuring the Dong Duong Style of Cham art. ==== Africa ==== * The construction of Mosque of Uqba, Kairouan, Tunisia, is ended. == Births == * Muslim ibn al-Hajjaj Nishapuri Islamic writer == Deaths == * August 12 - Louis II, Western Emperor * Amram Gaon, Jewish liturgist * Abu Muslim, Persian hadith compiler Category:870s
